bio: Open Source DevRel | Founder of **EddieHub** and [LinkFree](https://linkfree.io) | **GitHub** Star

events.name: Open Source GitHub reviews
events.description: In this livestream I will be going reviewing your **Open Source projects** and profiles! I will be joined by **Amanda**, a Developer Advocate.

events.name: Google DevFest London
events.description: This year, your DevFest will feature leading experts on Google technologies in areas like Web, Firebase, Flutter, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud and so much more including a mini-careers fair!

events.name: DevRelCon Yokohama 2023
events.description: an English language conference bringing the developer relations community back together in person for two days of sharing, learning, and communing.

events.name: EddieCon v0.2 Unconference
events.description: On Saturday 27 May my livestream is going to be a little bit different... I am going to combine this with our EddieHub community call - with an extra twist! It is going to be a mini-unconference! So what is an unconference? Well - you can submit a talk and this will be chosen by the community! This is the perfect opportunity if you want to practice your public speaking skills or if you want to test out a topic that you want to submit for another event. The one rule that applies is.... it must be open source related! I will be there to support you. What are you waiting for? Go and submit your talk now!

events.name: WeAreDevelopers World Congress
events.description: SHAPING THE FUTURE TOGETHER. Every year, we are dedicated to bringing together software developers and tech decision-makers from all around the globe to discuss and learn about the latest trends and innovations shaping our world.

events.name: Infobip Shift Conference
events.description: This is not another developer event. This is an experience that brings together the global tech community for two days of learning, networking, and creating new memories. This is a gathering of professionals, founders, leaders, disruptors, and dreamers. This is Infobip Shift. And we want to Shift Your World.

links.name: YouTube: Learn more about Open Source
EddieHub: Inclusive Open Source Community (Discord, GitHub Org ...)

milestones.title: GitHub Star
milestones.description: Became a **GitHub** Star for the first year of the program

milestones.title: GitHub Star of the Year
milestones.description: Won GitHub Star of the Year out of 55+ million people

milestones.title: Started Open Source project Linkfree
milestones.description: Connecting your audience with a single link: this project started on a YouTube livestream

milestones.title: GitHub Nova, Community Growth Award
milestones.description: Won for growing the EddieHub Community to over 30k members.

milestones.title: GitHub Nova, Top Teacher Award
milestones.description: Won top teacher award from GitHub.

milestones.title: Course on helping people get started with Open Source
milestones.description: I am 50% of the way through my course of helping people getting into Open Source

milestones.title: LinkFree to a SAAS platform
milestones.description: Have advanced premium features, but will always be free and open source

name: Eddie Jaoude Preview

testimonials.title: Founder of an Amazing Community
testimonials.description: Eddie founded EddieHub, an opensource community, which aparked my interest in all things FOSS and FOSH. Eddie's YouTube videos are also inspiring, especially the livestreams, where one can really see the community come together. My number one reccommendation to anyone who's starting thier opensource jouney :sparkles:

testimonials.title: Open Source Guru!
testimonials.description: If you're new to Open Source and come from a non-technical background, I highly recommend Eddie as your mentor. His detailed explanations on how to contribute to EddieHub's repostories are digestible. His unwavering patience and consistent efforts in creating an inclusive community motivates you to better!

testimonials.title: Eddie === Open Source
testimonials.description: it's difficult to describe in such a few words what Eddie has done and he is doing for the Developer community. The passion he transmits online is 1/10 of the one he transmits live, and meeting him and having the first collaboration on Youtube in 2020 was a great moment. I wish him and Sara the best for the future and to geek out as much as possible. Eddie === Open Source

testimonials.title: Open Source's Bestfriend
testimonials.description: Thanks to Eddie, I was introduced to Open Source. Eddie makes it fun to contribute and is very helpful when it comes to onboarding new people to open source. He is one of the most friendly, funny, and humble people I know. Always ready to help and support the community, I say a million thank yous for all the devotion!

testimonials.title: Open Source Advocate
testimonials.description: Eddie is a big name in Open source, he has sparked the interest for open source in a lot of people, myself inclusive. I recommend Eddie for anyone looking to have an easy, smooth and amazing experience with open source

testimonials.title: The one and only!
testimonials.description: Eddie is one of the most compassionate, funny, talented and dedicated people I know! He has a wealth of knowledge and loves sharing it with others. Of course, I can't fail to mention he's the king of Open Source and is the first to advocate and help others get started in their Open Source journey!

testimonials.title: Best Friend to Opensource
testimonials.description: Eddie Jaoude is your person if you are just stepping into Opensource. Be it making your first pull request or making your GitHub profile more approachable by people and recruits, Eddie helps at every milestone. Eddie is also the founder of the awesome community, EddieHub - a super-inclusive and friendly space for everyone. Kudos for helping everyone out.

testimonials.title: A true Eddlian
testimonials.description: Eddie, the founder of the EddieHub community, is a true leader in the tech industry. He founded the successful LinkFree project and served as an incredible mentor to those around him. He has a unique ability to share his knowledge and experience in an approachable and impactful way. His guidance and support have significantly and positively impacted my career. I highly recommend Eddie as a mentor, leader, and community builder. He is an asset to any organization or project.

testimonials.title: Best Guru to learn about GitHub
testimonials.description: Your Youtube Videos helps me a lot to learn about GitHub. Thanks for making such excellent videos.

testimonials.title: The Open Sourcerer Guru!
testimonials.description: Eddie is an exceptional individual who has been so helpful in my journey into the world of open source. Not only did he guide me through the intricacies of the open source community, but he also goes above and beyond to help others in any way possible. His passion for technology and generosity towards others is truly inspiring, and it's been a privilege to have him as a mentor. I highly recommend Eddie for anyone looking to get started in open source or simply seeking guidance and support in the tech industry.

testimonials.title: King Of Open Source
testimonials.description: Eddie Jaoude literally motivated me as a person to get started with the open source through EddieHub. My first voyage into open source was during Hacktoberfest 2022. He has been an amazing inspiration to a lot of people and to me.

cleanBio: Open Source DevRel | Founder of EddieHub and LinkFree | GitHub Star
